Title: Provides a tax credit to certain landowners who allow snowmobile access on such land
Summary: Provides a tax credit to certain landowners who allow snowmobile access on such land.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax credit to certain landowners who allow snowmobile access on such land
